    • editAppointment

      public void editAppointment(Appointment selectedAppointment)
      Sets the selectedAppointment. Populates form fields and controls with appointment data.
      Parameters:
      selectedAppointment - The appointment for which form values are set

    • onSaveClick

      public void onSaveClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Collects and validates form data. Creates/updates appointments with collected form data. Closes the appointment form.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The action event triggered by the save button

    • onCancelClick

      public void onCancelClick()
      Closes the form without saving.

    • setTimeCombos

      private void setTimeCombos(Appointment a)
      Converts 24-hour to 12-hour time and sets combo values.
      Parameters:
      a - The appointment for which time values are set.

    • validateForm

      private boolean validateForm()
      Verifies that all appointment details have been filled. Highlights empty fields and displays an error message if validation fails.
      Returns:
      True if all fields are filled, otherwise False

    • validateTime

      private boolean validateTime(String start, String end)
      Validates the start and end times of an appointment. Highlights time selectors and displays an error message if validation fails.
      Parameters:
      start - The start time of the appointment in UTC string format.
      end - The end time of the appointment in UTC string format.
      Returns:
      True if times are valid, otherwise False

    • appointmentOverlap

      private boolean appointmentOverlap(Customer selectedCustomer, LocalDate date, String start, String end)
      Checks if an appointment conflicts with an existing appointment for the given customer and date. Uses stream operations and lambda expression predicates for concise code. The first lambda filters the schedule stream based on appointment customer and date. The second lambda checks each matching appointment for overlap status.
      Parameters:
      selectedCustomer - The customer whose appointments will be checked.
      date - The date of the appointment.
      start - The start time of the appointment in UTC string format.
      end - The end time of the appointment in UTC string format.
      Returns:
      True if there is a conflict with an existing appointment, False otherwise.
